channel.title: How to change starting stats
channel.description: I was wondering how to change the starting stats of a player using a source such as Runescape 3. I have almost recreated everything into a PK server with nice starting equipment and banks, and now I want to change the starting stats. I have looked all over Player.java and Playerhandler.java and could think of a few places to change the starting stats but I just want to make sure, where can I find the area to change the starting stats?

item.title: How to change starting stats
item.dc:creator: @Maskmanator Maskmanator
item.description:
@Maskmanator wrote:

Lol alright man, Rep ++ if you find it :D. And No problem, I do it all the time. :).

Read full topic

item.title: How to change starting stats
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Go into Player.java and search for

public int playerAttack = 0;

And below that you should see something like this:

public int playerAttack = 0;
	public int playerDefence = 1;
	public int playerStrength = 2;
	public int playerHitpoints = 3;
	public int playerRanged = 4;
	public int playerPrayer = 5;
	public int playerMagic = 6;
	public int playerCooking = 7;
	public int playerWoodcutting = 8;
	public int playerFletching = 9;
	public int playerFishing = 10;
	public int playerFiremaking = 11;
	public int playerCrafting = 12;
	public int playerSmithing = 13;
	public int playerMining = 14;
	public int playerHerblore = 15;
	public int playerAgility = 16;
	public int playerThieving = 17;
	public int playerSlayer = 18;
	public int playerFarming = 19;
	public int playerRunecrafting = 20;

Change that to what you want, I don’t no if this is how you do this, I haven’t done something like this is a long time, So.

Read full topic
